title: Innocent
description:
Pairing: Riku x Sora + Kairi

Sora is kindhearted so when he finds a baby chocobo with it's dead mother he decides to take care of it even though Riku protested against it. Since Sora must take care of the baby chocobo he can't play with Riku as much as he used to. On top of that Sora becomes friends with Kairi which makes Riku even more jealous.
